result.execSummary:
All charges against William Henry Butler III in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. William Henry Butler III is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. William Henry Butler III

records.addlTxt:
Defendant William Henry Butler III in court.  Attorney Christopher John Ertl appeared by video for William Henry Butler III.  Prosecuting attorney Michael J. Odden in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a Jury Trial.  State's witness is not available and the State is unable to proceed. Defense moves to dismiss the case. Court ordered case dismissed.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report 09-16-2022

Defendant William Henry Butler in court with attorney Christopher John Ertl.  Julie Ann Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Final pretrial proceeded.  State's offer stated on the record.  Defense rejects State's offer.  Case remains in jury trial posture.  Case is adjourned to 9-19-22 at 8:30 am for Jury Trial.
Received and Filed. Pretrial Services Supervision Report 08-16-2022
Received and Filed. Motions in Limine
Received and Filed. Defendants Proposed Jury Instructions

Defendant William Henry Butler in court with attorney Christopher John Ertl.  Claire E Zyber appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defense is requesting final pretrial and jury trial dates. Case is adjourned to 8-17-22 at 8:30 am for final pretrial and 9-19-22 at 8:30 am for jury trial.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant William Henry Butler in court with attorney Christopher John Ertl. Jessica Birmingham appeared under the Student Practice Rule under the supervision of  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Parties are still negotiating and requesting a status conference.  Case is adjourned to 7-21-22 at 8:30 am for status conference, by zoom.
  This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Status conference scheduled for July 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.

Defendant William Henry Butler in court with attorney Colleen A Taylor.  Defendant William Henry Butler in custody.  Joseph C. Mathy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  William Henry Butler appeared by video means with Attorney.  Due to case not being CPAU (ADA assignment), Defendant is advised this case is reassigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS NOT INDIGENT.  This hearing will be streamed live on DAcast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with LAJ and TAJ
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
